comments.raw_text: remove tables that facilitate page layout from edit/create ui to facilitate 5.0 redesign.
comments.creator: guy.pyrzak@gmail.com
comments.text: remove tables that facilitate page layout from edit/create ui to facilitate 5.0 redesign.
comments.author: guy.pyrzak@gmail.com

comments.text:
We are going to branch for Bugzilla 4.4 next week and this bug is too invasive or too risky to be accepted for 4.4 at this point. The target milestone is set to 5.0 which is our next major release.

I ask the assignee to reassign the bug to the default assignee if you don't plan to work on this bug in the near future, to make it clearer which bugs should be fixed by someone else on time for 5.0.
comments.author: LpSolit@gmail.com
comments.creator: LpSolit@gmail.com

comments.text:
>remove tables that facilitate page layout from edit/create ui to facilitate 5.0 redesign.

I would like to work on this bug but I don't quite understand what you mean by  the 5.0 redesign.
Any docs on this will be helpful.
